content:
/>
Introduction
This topic contains information on establishing an individual as a Veteran’s biological parent, including
requirement for documentary evidence
primary evidence of a parental relationship
, and
establishing as a Veteran’s biological father an individual who was not married to the Veteran’s biological mother at the time of the Veteran’s birth
.
title: M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 4, Section A - Establishing Parental Relationship
citation: Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 4, Section A
